name: Arbour (Dani C ☁️)
description:
A game about roots and routes. Play as a tree and collect water to expand. Contemplated the connected nature of life. Vibe.

Completed in 48hr for the Global Game Jam 2023

"Find Water Tree is my favourite game" - Adel

"It's a rooting tooting good time" - Kellen

"I enjoy trees" -Marcus

"Botanical illustrators either hate or love her" - Danielle
